body: @dsymonds my initial thoughts: there are two sorts of technical solutions for social problems - additional constraints and relaxations of rules. `gofmt` is a constraint, linting is a constraint, hiding things is a constraint -- however aliasing is a relaxation of rules. They have different dynamics. I'm trying to think of good relaxations that significantly helped with social problems, but I have a really hard time finding one. I can only think of few "relaxations" that made things more convenient.
